text: تَحِيَّتُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَلۡقَوۡنَهُۥ سَلَٰمٞۚ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا كَرِيمٗا

translation.en: Their greeting the Day they meet Him will be, "Peace." And He has prepared for them a noble reward
translation.id: Penghormatan mereka (orang-orang mukmin itu) ketika mereka menemui-Nya ialah, "Salam,"685) dan Dia menyediakan pahala yang mulia bagi mereka
